pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Spanish support for Plover #*Authors: Sonsoles García Martín, Noelia Ruiz MartínezPlover support for Melani system in Spanish, used at MQD.Based on this [template](https://github.com/benoit-pierre/plover_template_system).## Dependencies ##* [Plover Python dictionary](https://github.com/benoit-pierre/plover_python_dictionary)## Versioning ##We use [SemVer](https://semver.org/).## Changes ##[Changelog](https://github.com/nvdaes/plover_spanish_mqd/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
